answers.answer: You should still go to the doctor to be checked for preeclampsia if you are exhibiting some of the major symptoms of it...

question: I'm 31+3 Days And For The Past Few Nights My Feet And Hands Have Been Feeling Like They're Stretched To The Max Or They Get Tingly,Usually It Goes Away By Morning But Today It Hurts To Even Try And Curl My Hands Or Walk On My Feet. Any Idea What To Do? My Bp Has Been Normal So Far So Don't Think Preclampsia.
title: swollen and hurts
